text: Musa balalena, ‘he amadera raba! Apani to phira’a'una o tara parisadabargake duniyara jibane sobha o sampada [1] dana karechena, he amadera raba! Ya dbara tara manusake apanara patha theke bhrasta kare [2]. He amadera raba! Tadera sampada binasta karuna, ara tadera hrdaya kathina kare dina, phale tara yantrananadayaka sasti pratyaksa na kara paryanta imana anabe na [3].’
